name: Protector
description: If an enemy unit is adjacent to this unit, when that enemy unit attacks, this unit must be the target in that attack. Any melee attack received is decreased by 1/2/3.

name: Big Shot
description: When attacking with this card, add 1/2/3 to this card damage attack value if it has not moved this turn.

name: Magic Ritual
description: When this unit attacks, add 1/2/2 to its damage attack value for each other friendly unit adjacent to this unit. Friendly fire is/is/isn't allowed.

name: Healing
description: Instead of attacking with this mechanic, you may heal a friendly unit adjacent to this unit 6/8/11HP. This unit cannot heal itself.

name: Onslaught
description: When this card attacks, it may attack all enemy units that are adjacent to it. All adjacent enemies receive DAMAGE - 2 / DAMAGE - 1/ DAMAGE.

name: Fleeing
description: After attacking with this card, you may move up to 1/2/3 spaces.

name: Slow
description: All targeted enemies of this card attack's area of effect, have their original movement decreased by 1 for 1x/2x/2x turns. The enemy movement cannot be decreased below 1. This effect doesn't stack. Friendly fire is/is/isn't allowed.

name: Flash Steps
description: At the end of turn, exchanges places with any unit that you control 3/5/7 spaces away.
